title: (x) type on Kodak film negative - Copperplate Gothic, Helvetica {Yves}
content:
Hi,  
Can someone please ID the Kodak watermark used on their film negs?

Greatly appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20141126165230/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%203_0.png) | 5.7 KB |
author: pbags

comments.content: We had this [just recently](http://web.archive.org/web/20141126165230/http:/www.google.com/url?sa=t&ct=res&cd=1&url=http%3A//www.typophile.com/node/13357&ei=acnzQsfwL7WGiAK4-KnNAg). The Kodak name in caps could be Copperplate Gothic, the film type looks like plain ol' Helvetica to me.
